Credit Line: The Cesnola Collection, Purchased by subscription, 1874–76
Description: Tall candlestick unguentarium.Translucent deep blue green.Tubular rim folded out, down, over and in, with beveled upper surface; tall, slender, and slightly concave cylindrical neck, with tooling marks around base; conical body; deep pushed-in bottom, with small circular pontil mark at center.Intact; pinprick and elongated bubbles; deep pitting, dulling, and iridescence with patches of thick creamy brown, enamel-like weathering.
